name: Ballance (itch)
description:
A game game for my uni class which is a mini-game inspired by mario party. Had fun making this game and a struggle to code. Thanks to my friends for helping with the codes .

Modes:

  • 2 players (1v1)
  • 3 players (Free for all)
  • 4 players (Free for all)

Controllers are needed.

Controls 

  • Left joystick move
  • Select/Back button to reset the whole game

*Note*

Controller inputs could be weird at some point the mapping gets mixed up (controller 1 to player 2 and so on).
